lines: Your company appears to be hungry, dear sir.
Allow me to remedy this by preparing an exquisite meal for you.
For a certain fee, of course. It shall be no detriment to you.
options: Buy a meal for the hungry passengers (200 Gold)

lines: It will give them newfound strength and please their souls.
No money for food means bad times are ahead for you.
I can only provide for your hunger if you provide for mine. Your gold doesn't pay my expenses.
Your passengers are now fed and should be able to travel with increased strength.
